meta.name: description
meta.content: Pickett County Schools serves K-12th grade students and is located in Byrdstown, TN.

img.alt: Photo of High School students in gym

article.div: School closure will be extended through the end of the school year due to Governor Bill Lee's recommendation.
The State ACT Test for Juniors has been rescheduled for April 21st. The April 4th National ACT Test date has been rescheduled to June 13th across the US. ACT will be sending information to students.

Pickett County Schools will be closed March 16th - 20th due to a high absentee rate caused by flu. This is NOT related to COVID-19. All employees will report to their assigned schools on Monday, March 16th at 8:00 am. The Junior State ACT Test scheduled for March 17th will be rescheduled.

h1.a: Pickett County Schools will dismiss at 12:30 on Thursday, March 12, 2020.
Pickett County School will be CLOSED today, Tuesday, March 3, 2020.
